H0.text: The Sagrada Famlia in Barcelona, which began construction in 1882, was consecrated and declared a basilica by the Pope in what year. 2005

H1.text: The Sagrada Famlia in Barcelona, which began construction in 1882, was consecrated and declared a basilica by the Pope in what year. 1992

H2.text: The Sagrada Famlia in Barcelona, which began construction in 1882, was consecrated and declared a basilica by the Pope in what year. 1985

H3.text: The Sagrada Famlia in Barcelona, which began construction in 1882, was consecrated and declared a basilica by the Pope in what year. 2010

A4.text: On 7 November 2010, Pope Benedict XVI consecrated the church and proclaimed it a minor basilica.
